translation.zh: NETFLIX 原创剧集

translation.en: ♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus ♪
translation.zh: 快来搭神奇校车！

translation.en: I knew I should have stayed home todayyyyyy!
translation.zh: 我就知道今天应该呆在家的！
耶！

translation.en: Booster shutdown and separation in three...
translation.zh: 关闭和分离助推器倒数 三
二、一
好酷啊
我们到了吗 福瑞斯老师？

translation.en: We'll have you in micro-gravity in a micro-second, Ralphie.
translation.zh: 还有几微秒就会处于微重力状态了 拉尔夫
看到没？
那就是国际空间站！
英语缩写是ISS

translation.en: Which has got to stand for, "It's so spectacular!"
translation.zh: 我觉得这一定是“超级无敌棒”的意思
而且超级无敌大
而且正在迅速逼近！
校车 施展你的魔法吧
别这么快
再慢一点
还是太快了！
准备对接

translation.en: I just have to line up the things...
translation.zh: 我只要对准就行了

translation.en: Oops. A little to the left. A little to the... Ohh! Ohh!
translation.zh: 然后 呃… 稍微往左一点 再稍微往…
福瑞斯老师

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] OK, OK, nope. Steady as she goes.
translation.zh: 好了 不对 我得保持平稳 就是这样 不对
我得保持平稳 就是这样 不对
我们对接上了！

translation.en: [Arnold] And I'm totally comfortable with our speed now.
translation.zh: 我觉得现在这个速度非常合适
瞧 我们到了
正中靶心
嘿 我飞起来了

translation.en: Well, Ralphie, because you're in micro-gravity,
translation.zh: 拉尔夫 这是因为你处于微重力状态

translation.en: you're not so much flying as you are falling. Continuously.
translation.zh: 与其说飞起来 你其实是在持续下落

translation.en: You're floating because you're in continuous freefall around the Earth.
translation.zh: 你漂浮着是因为你在绕着地球做持续的自由落体
这就叫绕轨道运行

translation.en: OK, but... it's still a superpower.
translation.zh: 好吧 不过 这仍然是一项超能力
等等我
我怎么动不了呢？

translation.en: Just push off of something and you'll go in the opposite direction.
translation.zh: 随便找个东西推一把 你就会朝反方向移动了
哇！

translation.en: Or just grab onto the Carlos Express.
translation.zh: 或者你可以搭乘卡洛斯快车
噢耶！
阿诺德 你不一起来吗？

translation.en: As soon as I figure out how to release all the extra seat belts I added.
translation.zh: 等我先把这么多根安全带解开再说

translation.en: -[kid scoffs] -What? We're 400 kilometers above the Earth.
translation.zh: 干吗？我们离地球有400公里呢
不过就是248英里嘛
就是说啊
安全第一
情况不妙啊
冒险在等着我们呢
闻闻这新鲜的循环空气
菲奥娜 欢迎回来
再次见到你真好

translation.en: Hey, guys! Good to see all of you. How are ya?
translation.zh: 你们好呀！ 见到你们真好 你们好吗？
来击个掌 还有你
等等 老师之前来过这里？
那是当然

translation.en: I did a four-month tour of duty up here right after my last stint with the circus.
translation.zh: 我来这里执行过四个月的任务 就在我结束马戏团的工作之后

translation.en: Who knew the flying trapeze would prepare me for space?
translation.zh: 没想到表演空中飞人还能助我上太空

translation.en: And these must be the rookie astronauts we've heard so much about.
translation.zh: 想必这些就是我们多有耳闻的菜鸟宇航员吧

translation.en: No, these are a different set of children.
translation.zh: 不 他们是另外一拨孩子
逗你们的

translation.en: These are the very first kids to board the International Space Station.
translation.zh: 没错 他们就是史上首次 登上国际空间站的孩子们
-没错！-噢耶！

translation.en: Commander Hadfield told us you guys did a great job at NASA space training.
translation.zh: 听哈德菲尔德指挥官说 你们在宇航局的太空训练中表现很好

translation.en: We all trained super hard for this mission.
translation.zh: 我们为了这次任务训练得可刻苦了

translation.en: We are so ready for anything!
translation.zh: 我们准备好迎接一切挑战
我说是吧？
没错
啊！
啊！

translation.en: But maybe not quite ready to live in micro-g.
translation.zh: 可能还没太准备好在微重力下生活吧

translation.en: Just take it slowly. You'll get the hang of it.
translation.zh: 慢慢来就好 总会找到窍门的
好了 菲奥娜

translation.en: Your class has the station until the next crew arrives tomorrow morning.
translation.zh: 明早换班之前 这里就交给你班里了
-太酷了！-不是吧？ 哇！
祝你们好运 玩开心哦
微重力真是太棒了！

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah. You can be even lazier than usual.
translation.zh: 是啊 你可以比平常还要懒

translation.en: [laughs] I know, right? I don't even have to hold up my head.
translation.zh: 就是说啊 我都不用费力气把脖子打直

translation.en: We don't wanna be moving around in our flight suits.
translation.zh: 我们就别穿着飞行服在空间站晃悠了
我差点忘了
校车无人机来啦
你好啊 迷你校车
好酷啊 它好可爱呀
真棒

translation.en: What have you got there, Jyoti?
translation.zh: 你手上是什么 乔蒂？
是无人机的视角

translation.en: Whatever Itty-B sees, we see on my FrizzPad.
translation.zh: 凡是迷你校车见到的东西 都会在福瑞斯平板上
嗨！

translation.en: Is that the Bus remote, Ms. Frizzle?
translation.zh: 那是校车的遥控器吗 福瑞斯老师？
没错 阿诺德

translation.en: As you know, it's also the Porta-Shrinker...
translation.zh: 你知道 这还是一个便携缩小器
放大器
哎哟

translation.en: I just had this little feature installed. It's called the Shriek-a-Maker.
translation.zh: 哦 我刚刚装上了一个新功能 叫做尖叫制造器
你说什么？
尖叫制造器！

translation.en: I think maybe one Shriek-a-Maker is enough.
translation.zh: 我觉得我一个人负责尖叫就够了吧？

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] If you say so. Keep this in a safe place, then.
translation.zh: 说得也是 那你把这个保管好吧

translation.en: Before we get to work, I have something very special to show you.
translation.zh: 在开工之前 我要给你们看一样很特别的东西
跟我来
喂 等着我

translation.en: This is my most favorite, favorite, favorite place in the Space Station.
translation.zh: 这是我在空间站上最最喜欢的地方
真壮观呀
太棒了
快看啊

translation.en: [Wanda] It makes me feel very small.
translation.zh: 这让我感觉好渺小啊
但是  也有和万物相连的感觉

translation.en: OK, astronauts, you all have your assigned positions.
translation.zh: 好了 宇航员们 你们都有分配好的职位
该点名了
我是指挥官凯莎 前来报到
我是科学官旺达
我是飞行工程师乔蒂
我是任务专家陶乐西
我是机械专家提姆
我是安全官阿诺德
大家都安全吗？
很好 我的工作完成了
我是通讯官卡洛斯
也负责舱内娱乐
国际空间站的成员们 早上好

translation.en: Actually, days are only 90 minutes long on the station.
translation.zh: 其实啊 空间站的白天只有90分钟
所以现在已经是下午了

translation.en: The ISS orbits Earth 16 times every 24 hours.
translation.zh: 国际空间站每24小时绕地球转16次

translation.en: Which means we'll see the sun rise and set 16 times today.
translation.zh: 所以我们今天会看到16次日出和日落
是吗？
最后还有一位重要的成员是…
我是首席维护官拉尔夫
首席维护官是什么？

translation.en: The janitor. I'm psyched! 'Cause I get to do stuff like this.
translation.zh: 就是清洁工 我太激动了 因为我可以这样做
拉尔夫 你在做什么呢？
那个太空舱里装满了…
快看！脏衣服
-好酷啊-真厉害
太棒了！
哇！ 刚才那是怎么了？

translation.en: Since there aren't any washing machines on the ISS,
translation.zh: 由于国际空间站上没有洗衣机

translation.en: dirty laundry goes into a capsule that we drop into Earth's atmosphere,
translation.zh: 脏衣服会被放进太空舱 然后扔进地球的大气层

translation.en: where it burns it up as it falls.
translation.zh: 在坠落的过程中被燃烧掉
这就搞定啦！

translation.en: Is that... a monogrammed hand towel?
translation.zh: 那是… 印了你名字缩写的擦手巾吗？

translation.en: Yup. Never leave Earth without one.
translation.zh: 没错 离开地球一定要带上它哦

translation.en: Now to make this place smell lemon pine springtime mountain air fresh.
translation.zh: 现在我要让这里有柠檬松树春季山林般的清新气味
就靠它啦！

translation.en: You know what, fun fact: they don't allow aerosol cans in space because...
translation.zh: 跟你们说个有趣的知识 太空中不能使用喷雾罐 因为…
这就是原因
-哎哟-抱歉 我错了
-哎哟-喂！
哎哟！ 拉尔夫 小心
刚才是怎么回事呀？

translation.en: In the station's micro-g, we can only really move around
translation.zh: 在空间站的微重力下 我们要想移动只能借助表面推自己一把

translation.en: when we push ourselves off a surface
translation.zh: 我们要想移动只能借助表面推自己一把

translation.en: or when a force pushes against us,
translation.zh: 或者靠推力作用于我们

translation.en: like compressed air shooting out of an aerosol can.
translation.zh: 比如从喷雾罐里喷出的压缩空气

translation.en: For every action, there's an equal and opposite reaction.
translation.zh: 每一个作用力 都有大小相等而方向相反的反作用力
是不是很酷？
她早说不就好了

translation.en: -Can I do it again? -We're in space, Ralphie.
translation.zh: 我能再来一次吗？ 我们在太空中呢 拉尔夫 这不是演习

translation.en: This isn't a drill. You need to be serious.
translation.zh: 我们在太空中呢 拉尔夫 这不是演习 你要认真对待才行
拜托 我很认真啊

translation.en: When am I ever not serious?
translation.zh: 我什么时候不认真了？

translation.en: Um, all those times during space training?
translation.zh: 呃 你在做太空训练的时候啊
做得好 各位
你还好吗 拉尔夫？
快看我 哈德菲尔德指挥官
我是匹诺曹 啊！
拉尔夫 你是认真的吗？
嗨 妈妈！

translation.en: I'm having a lot of fun at Space Training...
translation.zh: 太空训练好好玩哦
拉尔夫 你是认真的吗？
耶！

translation.en: Aaah! Direct hit, but no effect.
translation.zh: 直接命中 但是没有效果

translation.en: The alien shields are too strong.
translation.zh: 外星人的护盾太坚固了

translation.en: Our photon cannons are useless against a ship of this size.
translation.zh: 我们的光子炮根本对付不了这么大的一艘船
准备好全力加速！
指挥官 为你效力是我的荣幸
你在说什么呢？
为沃克维尔小学而战！
拉尔夫 你是认真的吗？

translation.en: OK, but now that we're actually in space, I will be super serious. Trust me.
translation.zh: 好吧 不过我们现在真的上太空了 我会超级认真的 相信我

translation.en: Good. And the first step in being serious is communication.
translation.zh: 那就好 认真对待的第一步就是做好沟通

translation.en: It's important to let everyone know what you're doing at all times.
translation.zh: 你一定要让大家知道你在干什么 而且是每时每刻哦
好吧

translation.en: I'm scratching my armpit now because it's super itchy.
translation.zh: 我正在挠腋窝 因为这里超痒的
有意思

translation.en: So there's no such thing as over-communicating in space?
translation.zh: 所以在太空中不存在过度沟通吗？
没错 看见了吗？

translation.en: Even the labels here are written in both English and Russian
translation.zh: 连这里的标签也是英俄双语的

translation.en: for the crews that speak those languages.
translation.zh: 以方便讲这些语言的成员
（任务周期文件 采样拭子）

translation.en: English-speaking astronauts learn a little Russian
translation.zh: 说英语的宇航员会学一点俄语

translation.en: and Russian cosmonauts learn a little English.
translation.zh: 俄罗斯的宇航员则会学一点英语

translation.en: That's right, and they end up speaking a mixture of the two called "Runglish."
translation.zh: 没错 结果他们两种混着说 成了“俄式英语”
梅什杜那罗德尼亚兹克
合作和爱！
但愿如此

translation.en: All right, class, to your stations.
translation.zh: 好了 同学们 回到你们的工作位
一会儿见了

translation.en: [Like Darth Vader] Wanda, this is your destiny...
translation.zh: 旺达 这是你的命中注定
实验舱

translation.en: It's the US laboratory where many science experiments
translation.zh: 这是美国的实验室 随时都有许多科学实验在此进行

translation.en: are being run at any given time.
translation.zh: 随时都有许多科学实验在此进行

translation.en: Sometimes the best way to understand how things work
translation.zh: 有时弄清事物原理的最佳方式

translation.en: is to look at them in a brand-new way.
translation.zh: 就是以全新的视角观察它们

translation.en: Have a look at this, Science Officer Wanda.
translation.zh: 你来看看这个 科学官旺达
这是一只缓步动物

translation.en: [Wanda] Ooh. I've read about tardigrades, but I've never seen one for real.
translation.zh: 我读到过缓步动物 但从没亲眼见过

translation.en: They're the only known animals that can survive
translation.zh: 它们是唯一已知的能存活于

translation.en: in the irradiated vacuum of space, right?
translation.zh: 有辐射的太空真空中的动物吧？

translation.en: Which is why scientists are interested in studying them in this environment.
translation.zh: 所以科学家们很有兴趣 在这种环境下研究它们
哎哟喂呀 瞧现在几点了

translation.en: It's two hairs past "I need to adjust the solar panels
translation.zh: 我再不去调整太阳能板

translation.en: or we'll lose power and freeze in space" o'clock.
translation.zh: 我们就会没电 在太空真空里挨冻了

translation.en: What are you looking at, Wanda?
translation.zh: 你在看什么 旺达？
你自己看吧

translation.en: [Ralphie] Blecch. It looks like something I need to clean up.
translation.zh: 这看着像是我需要清理的东西

translation.en: It's a tardigrade, and it's cute.
translation.zh: 这是一只缓步动物 很可爱的

translation.en: Just look at those chubby legs.
translation.zh: 瞧它那胖乎乎的腿

translation.en: Who's a cute little water animal?
translation.zh: 谁是个可爱的水生动物呀？
你 没错 就是你

translation.en: I'm going to call you... Pinky.
translation.zh: 我就叫你… 小拇指吧

translation.en: Hey, who wants in on this genuine Space Ice Cream I brought?
translation.zh: 喂！ 谁想吃我带来的正宗太空冰淇淋？
我！

translation.en: Blasting dirty laundry into space is hungry work.
translation.zh: 把脏衣服射入太空把我给弄饿了

translation.en: You do know Space Ice Cream isn't actually supposed to be eaten in space, right?
translation.zh: 你知道太空冰淇淋不能在太空吃吧？

translation.en: Why would they call it "Space Ice Cream" if you can't eat it in space?
translation.zh: 不能在太空吃的话 干吗要叫太空冰淇淋呢？
因为会掉下很多碎渣
我一会儿清理就好了

translation.en: Good, 'cause if those crumbs get into the ISS's delicate electronics,
translation.zh: 那好 要是有碎渣掉进了空间站的精密电子仪器
那可就糟糕了
而且会很不安全

translation.en: Is this you taking things seriously?
translation.zh: 这就是你所说的认真对待吗？

translation.en: [mouth full] But this stuff is seriously good.
translation.zh: 可是这个冰淇淋真的很好吃

translation.en: [groans] I'll find the portable vacuum cleaner.
translation.zh: 我去找一台便携吸尘器
我来帮你找

translation.en: No, I'm the Chief Maintenance Officer. I'll clean up this mess.
translation.zh: 不 我是首席维护官 这里该由我来清理

translation.en: Hey, Arn, that's the Porta-Shrinker, isn't it?
translation.zh: 喂 阿诺 那个是便携缩小器吧？
是啊
能借给我吗？
不行吧

translation.en: If I biggify these crumbs, they'll be easier to catch.
translation.zh: 如果我把碎渣放大的话 那会更好抓

translation.en: I can see the logic. But be safe, OK?
translation.zh: 逻辑上倒是讲得通 不过要小心 好吗？
真是天才 成功了

translation.en: Cool! Now the crumbs are the size of baseballs.
translation.zh: 好酷啊 现在碎渣和棒球一般大小了
击球手准备
-这位选手挥棒了-喂！
-这位选手挥棒了-喂！ 挥棒落空 再来一球
挥棒落空 再来一球
这是一个高飞球
卡洛斯接住了它

translation.en: Over to you, Chief Maintenance Officer.
translation.zh: 交给你了 首席维护官

translation.en: C'mon, everyone. Time to get back to work.
translation.zh: 好了 大家 该回到工作岗位了

translation.en: We have a space station to run.
translation.zh: 我们要管理空间站呢

translation.en: Another fine job by the Chief Maintenance Officer.
translation.zh: 首席维护官再添佳绩

translation.en: Phew. That really made me work up a sweat. Whoo!
translation.zh: 都把我弄出一身汗了

translation.en: This towel is really filling up.
translation.zh: 这块毛巾都吸满了
我真是个爱出汗的小子
干吗？
这也没有那么糟吧
怎么了 蜥蜥？

translation.en: What in the name of all that's black hole-y is that?
translation.zh: 这到底是个什么玩意儿啊？
我们快点离开这里
那是什么东西啊？
那是…
外星人！
拉尔夫 旺达

translation.en: You know, when I first came up here,
translation.zh: 话说我刚来这里的时候

translation.en: I tried to wash my hair using regular shampoo,
translation.zh: 我用普通的洗发水洗过头

translation.en: but when you try to rinse it out, the water goes everywhere.
translation.zh: 结果冲洗的时候 水喷得到处都是
-福瑞斯老师…-有个大…

translation.en: So now I use this special rinseless shampoo.
translation.zh: 所以现在我用这个特制的免冲洗洗发水

translation.en: ♪ Just rub it in your hair And leave it there ♪
translation.zh: 只要抹在头发上搓揉就完事儿啦
-可是 不好了！-有怪物 那个…

translation.en: It's "the CO2 levels need to be adjusted or we'll be in serious trouble" o'clock.
translation.zh: 我该去调整二氧化碳水平了 不然我们可就有大麻烦了

translation.en: [laughs] Never a dull moment on the ISS.
translation.zh: 国际空间站上真是一刻不得闲呢

translation.en: I love how you don't need any chairs in space.
translation.zh: 在太空中都不需要椅子 这点我喜欢
连手也不需要
这个炖菜还不赖

translation.en: Who wants some macaroni and cheese, hot from the oven?
translation.zh: 谁想要刚刚出炉的芝士通心粉？
你是说“挤”士通心粉吧
怪物！

translation.en: Ralphie, what did I say about communication?
translation.zh: 拉尔夫 我不是说了要做好沟通吗？
我们没法从“怪物”得知…
大怪物
太空怪物 在太空站乱跑！

translation.en: OK, that's better communication. But as Commander, it's my job to...
translation.zh: 好吧 这样沟通好些了 但作为指挥官 我的工作是…
呼叫地面指挥中心 其余的人…
呼叫地面指挥中心 其余的人… 躲起来！

translation.en: -Great idea, Safety Officer. -Just doing my job.
translation.zh: 好主意 安全官 这是我的本职工作
抱歉 我们迟到…
那是什么啊？快跑！
我们遭遇袭击了！ 该怎么办呢？
我们躲这里吧
卫生间？不行

translation.en: I've seen way too many scary movies to hide in a bathroom.
translation.zh: 我看过很多恐怖电影在卫生间躲怪物没好下场

translation.en: Hang on, I'm getting a brilliant Chief Maintenance Officer idea.
translation.zh: 等一下 本首席维护官突然灵光一现

translation.en: Both toilets on the ISS work with a fan suction system
translation.zh: 空间站的两个马桶 都有风机抽吸系统

translation.en: to suck the pee and pookadumpadoody away.
translation.zh: 以便把尿尿和便便给吸走

translation.en: Can we talk plumbing when we're not being hunted by a monster?
translation.zh: 我们先摆脱巨型怪物再讨论卫生管道吧

translation.en: This tube is for number one and this seat is where you do number two.
translation.zh: 这个管子是上小号的 上大号就坐在这个上面

translation.en: I see where you're going. We could--
translation.zh: 我懂你的意思了 我们可以…

translation.en: Suck the monster out into space--
translation.zh: 把怪物抽到太空中去
通过马桶 没错！可是…
通过马桶 没错！可是… 可是什么？

translation.en: The monster's way too big to fit down there.
translation.zh: 怪物太大了 塞不进去

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm sure you're "flushed" with other ideas.
translation.zh: 别担心 你的灵感肯定像冲水般滔滔不绝

translation.en: Now I have to go to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 现在我想上厕所了
你只有憋住了
我们去哪里躲呢？

translation.en: Nothing like the clean, crisp taste of water distilled from astronaut urine.
translation.zh: 宇航员尿液蒸馏而成的水喝起来真是洁净又爽口啊
别大惊小怪

translation.en: It's been filtered and cleaned by the water reclamation system
translation.zh: 它经过太空站水回收系统的过滤净化

translation.en: and turned back into pure drinking water.
translation.zh: 变成了纯净的饮用水

translation.en: Ewww! I don't know what's scarier, the monster or that fact.
translation.zh: 好恶心！ 我不知道怪物和喝尿哪个更可怕
喝尿 肯定是喝尿

translation.en: Oh! You guys, don't be so judge-y.
translation.zh: 哎呀 你们两个 不要有偏见嘛

translation.en: Water treatment plants on Earth do sort of the same thing.
translation.zh: 地球上的水处理厂和这个差不多啊
再去续一杯
-福瑞斯老师-它就在我们后面！

translation.en: [Ralphie] Why me, why me, why me?
translation.zh: 为什么偏偏是我？
拉尔夫 快动啊

translation.en: I can't, I can't, I can't.
translation.zh: 我动不了
等一下
清洁的水…
是国际空间站的生命之源

translation.en: Living creatures need it, no matter how small or big they may be.
translation.zh: 生物都需要饮水 不管它们的体积有多小还是多大
它是不是…
它走了

translation.en: Told ya you should never leave Earth without it.
translation.zh: 我就说离开地球一定要带上它吧
好恶心

translation.en: You guys, I think our "monster" is Pinky.
translation.zh: 我跟你们说 那个怪物好像是小拇指
什么？ 就是那只缓步动物

translation.en: I'd know those cute, chubby legs anywhere.
translation.zh: 我一眼就能认出那可爱又胖乎乎的腿

translation.en: How did it get so big?
translation.zh: 它怎么会变那么大呢？
作为舱内娱乐官

translation.en: I turned on the cameras to record our time here.
translation.zh: 我打开摄像头记录了这段时间的事

translation.en: I can rewind the footage to see what happened.
translation.zh: 我应该可以倒带 看究竟发生了什么
是我的错

translation.en: Keep it together, Keesha. Don't think about the giant monster.
translation.zh: 冷静点 凯莎 不要想那个巨型怪物了
深呼吸就好

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Now send the SOS to Mission Control.
translation.zh: 得给地面指挥中心发送求救信号
凯莎！

translation.en: Is there an intercom system? There's something I need to communicate.
translation.zh: 这里有对讲机系统吗？ 我有事情要沟通
各位注意了 注意

translation.en: The monster is actually a tardigrade.
translation.zh: 那个怪物其实是一只缓步动物

translation.en: Ooh, my brilliant class does it again.
translation.zh: 哦 我聪明的学生们又开窍了
可是缓步动物不是微型动物吗？

translation.en: I... accidentally biggified it with the Porta-Shrinker.
translation.zh: 我不小心用便携缩小器把它放大了
真是一点都不意外

translation.en: So here's what I'm going to do: I'm going to find the Porta-Shrinker
translation.zh: 所以我打算这么做 找到便携缩小器

translation.en: and zap the tardigrade small again.
translation.zh: 把缓步动物缩回原来的大小
这主意居然还挺不错
与此同时

translation.en: stay away from the giant tardigrade.
translation.zh: 不要靠近那个巨型的缓步动物

translation.en: It may not be dangerous, but then again, who knows?
translation.zh: 它可能并不危险 但话又说回来 谁知道呢？
我在搜该怎么处理

translation.en: "how to deal with a giant tardigrade floating around the ISS,"
translation.zh: 我在搜该怎么处理 在国际空间站游荡的巨型缓步动物

translation.en: but for some reason I'm not finding anything.
translation.zh: 可是不知为何 什么都搜不到
这倒不意外

translation.en: However we can find the tardigrade with Itty-B.
translation.zh: 不过 我们可以用迷你校车找缓步动物

translation.en: We can watch through its camera.
translation.zh: 通过看它的摄像头画面
它在那儿！ 它在干什么？
它在摧毁生命维持系统

translation.en: But there's nothing to worry about, right?
translation.zh: 但这没什么可担心的 对吧？

translation.en: Because there's like four backup systems?
translation.zh: 因为我们有四个备份系统？
现在只有三个了
根据我的调查

translation.en: these systems filter air that we can breathe and water we can drink.
translation.zh: 这些系统过滤我们可以呼吸的空气 和我们可以喝的水

translation.en: Perplexing. It's like it's searching for something.
translation.zh: 真令人费解 它好像在找什么东西
对啊 捕食新鲜的小孩子呗

translation.en: That may not be far from the truth. Some tardigrades are actually carnivorous.
translation.zh: 还真有可能是这么回事 有的缓步动物其实是肉食动物
现在可该我们担心了

translation.en: Negative. Ms. Frizzle would never let that thing eat us.
translation.zh: 不 福瑞斯老师绝不会让它吃掉我们

translation.en: But if it does eat you, then you have the once-in-a-lifetime chance
translation.zh: 但如果它真吃了你们 这可是千载难逢的机会

translation.en: to experience being eaten by a giant tardigrade.
translation.zh: 可以体验被缓步动物吃掉的滋味
真是双赢啊

translation.en: You know, this is even more exciting than the band of belligerent beetles
translation.zh: 话说这次还更刺激了呢 我上次只经历过四处乱跑的好斗甲虫

translation.en: that got loose on the station when I was here.
translation.zh: 我上次只经历过四处乱跑的好斗甲虫

translation.en: I'm pretty sure we got them all.
translation.zh: 我们应该是全都抓起来了
应该是吧

translation.en: Um... guys? The tardigrade is on the move!
translation.zh: 你们看 缓步动物正在移动

translation.en: It sounds like Itty-B is trying to warn us about something.
translation.zh: 迷你校车好像是想警告我们什么
缓步动物在此！

translation.en: Oh, you guys. Where's your sense of adventure?
translation.zh: 我说啊 你们的冒险精神去哪儿了？

translation.en: [panting] At least we're getting... a workout running from this thing.
translation.zh: 最起码逃跑可以算锻炼身体了吧
没错

translation.en: It's especially important to exercise on the ISS.
translation.zh: 在国际空间站里 锻炼身体非常重要

translation.en: According to my research, with less gravity to work against,
translation.zh: 根据我的调查 太空中的低重力会使肌肉失去力量

translation.en: our muscles lose strength and our bones lose some density in space.
translation.zh: 太空中的低重力会使肌肉失去力量 骨密度也会有所流失

translation.en: We get weaker the longer we're in space? Why does anyone come here?
translation.zh: 在太空留得越久就越虚弱吗？ 那怎么会有人愿意来这里？
哇 好险啊
它去哪儿了？
它在哪儿呢？ 啊！

translation.en: Would anyone like a towel to suck up their sweat?
translation.zh: 有人需要来条毛巾擦擦汗吗？
我自己有 谢了
低重力下无汗滴

translation.en: Gotta towel your own sweat off in micro-g.
translation.zh: 在微重力下 要靠自己擦拭汗珠

translation.en: So how do we get rid of this thing?
translation.zh: -那我们要怎么除掉怪物？-用绳子套？

translation.en: -Lasso it? -Lure it somewhere with space stew?
translation.zh: -那我们要怎么除掉怪物？-用绳子套？ 用太空炖菜引它去别处？

translation.en: Build a robotic power suit to wear in an epic showdown?
translation.zh: 为终极大对决打造巨型机械动力服？

translation.en: All great ideas, but just so you know, none of them worked on the beetles.
translation.zh: 这些点子都很棒 但我得告诉你们 这些对甲虫都没用

translation.en: There you are. I have a great idea!
translation.zh: 你们在这儿呢 我有一个很棒的主意

translation.en: Maybe we don't have to get rid of the creature.
translation.zh: 或许我们并不用除掉这个生物

translation.en: Still waiting for the great idea.
translation.zh: 我没听出这是哪门子的好主意

translation.en: We could keep it. As a pet.
translation.zh: 我们可以把它当宠物养
你想要养它？
不是“它” 而是“他”

translation.en: He has a name, remember? Pinky.
translation.zh: 他有名字的 记得吗？小拇指

translation.en: Probably not a good idea to keep it as a pet,
translation.zh: 把它当宠物养恐怕不大行吧

translation.en: and since I haven't found the Porta-Shrinker yet,
translation.zh: 既然我还没找到便携缩小器

translation.en: I know exactly what to do.
translation.zh: 我知道该怎么做了

translation.en: But first I need everyone on the Bus.
translation.zh: 但首先 大家都要上校车才行
拉尔夫呢？ 哦 同学们别担心 他一定就快来了

translation.en: You can wake me when he gets here. Time for my scheduled shut-eye.
translation.zh: 他来了再叫醒我吧 我得按日程眯一会儿了
在太空打个盹儿
大家都到了吗？ 好的

translation.en: So, what's the plan? Get on the Bus and leave?
translation.zh: 你到底有什么计划？ 坐校车离开吗？
我们不能一走了之 不能吗？作为首席安全官

translation.en: As Chief Safety Officer, I say we discuss the pros and cons.
translation.zh: 不能吗？作为首席安全官 我建议讨论一下利弊
小拇指怎么办？
听好了 我的计划是这样的
-拉尔夫-什么？
拉尔夫 你在做什么呢？
抱歉了 大家

translation.en: This is my mess. So I'm going to clean it up.
translation.zh: 这是我捅的篓子 该由我来处理

translation.en: And I want you all to stay safe while I do it.
translation.zh: 但在此期间 我想确保你们的安全
拉尔夫 不要啊
再见了
我的朋友

translation.en: You do know we can open the door from this side too, right?
translation.zh: 你知道这扇门也能从这边打开吧？
我…
还真不知道
但我现在知道了

translation.en: [various kids] Oh, no! Ralphie! Get out of there!
translation.zh: -糟了！-拉尔夫 -小心！-快走开

translation.en: The tardigrade is right behind you!
translation.zh: 缓步动物就在你身后
门打不开了
拉尔夫 快离开那里
喂 缓步动物
就是说你呢 你这个体积过大的

translation.en: you overgrown science experiment gone horribly wrong because of me.
translation.zh: 就是说你呢 你这个体积过大的 因我而起的重大科学实验失误
来抓我啊

translation.en: -[Wanda] Ralphie! -[Carlos] Come back! It's too dangerous!
translation.zh: 拉尔夫！ 快回来 这样太危险了

translation.en: [Keesha] What are you doing, Ralphie? Communication is key, remember?
translation.zh: 你在干什么 拉尔夫？ 沟通是关键 记得吗？

translation.en: [Wanda] Yeah, and I'm going to communicate how mad I'll be if you hurt Pinky.
translation.zh: 对 我这就沟通一下 你伤害小拇指的话 我会多火大
拉尔夫？
拉尔夫！
便携缩小器 便携缩小器在哪儿呢？
这下好了

translation.en: Gotta find the Porta-Shrinker before Pinky finds me.
translation.zh: 得在小拇指找到我之前找到便携缩小器

translation.en: This may be the worst idea I've ever had.
translation.zh: 这可能是我想出的最糟糕的点子
可见这有多糟糕
这… 这是什么？
蜥蜥？
有我在呢 你安全了
别担心 蜥蜥
我尽量不让你耳朵疼

translation.en: Wait, I'll just keep going the same direction,
translation.zh: 等一下 这样我只会一直往一个方向
我得停住才行

translation.en: Must get back to the hatch...
translation.zh: 我必须回到舱门那儿去
慢慢地
不要慌

translation.en: [straining] Come on, hatch. Open, open, open!
translation.zh: 拜托 舱门快开啊！
太好了
糟了
来抓我啊
其实 是我抓住你了
-拉尔夫亚历山德罗朱塞佩特纳利-什么？

translation.en: -Wha--? -Don't you dare hurt that poor tardigrade.
translation.zh: 你休想伤害那个可怜的生物

translation.en: Giant tardigrades have feelings too, you know.
translation.zh: 巨型缓步动物也是有感情的 懂吗？

translation.en: Feelings of anger, rage and fury!
translation.zh: 是愤怒、暴怒和狂怒的感情吧

translation.en: Is it gonna eat him? I can't look.
translation.zh: 它会吃掉他吗？我不敢看

translation.en: How can Ms. Frizzle sleep at a time like this?
translation.zh: 福瑞斯老师怎么能在这时候睡觉？

translation.en: According to her schedule, it's what she's supposed to be doing right now.
translation.zh: 根据她的日程安排 她现在是该睡觉

translation.en: The ISS orbits Earth 16 times every 24 hours
translation.zh: 国际空间站每24小时绕地球16次

translation.en: so astronauts don't have a big block of nighttime like on Earth.
translation.zh: 所以宇航员不像在地球上那样有一大段黑夜

translation.en: It's very important for astronauts to get their sleep.
translation.zh: 他们必须要补足睡眠才行

translation.en: Yeah, I get that's super important.
translation.zh: 是 我明白这很重要

translation.en: Except there's a giant tardigrade loose on the station!
translation.zh: 但空间站上有只乱跑的巨型缓步动物

translation.en: [kids] We're stuck in the Bus! Ms. Frizzle! Wake up! Giant tardigrade!
translation.zh: -我们被困在囚笼里了！-巨型缓步动物！
太厉害了 她睡得好熟啊

translation.en: Looks like we'll just have to figure this one out ourselves.
translation.zh: 看来我们只有自己想办法了

translation.en: No Porta-Shrinker in here either, and this is the end of the station.
translation.zh: 便携缩小器也不在这里 这已经是太空站的末端了

translation.en: If eating me will save everyone else...
translation.zh: 如果吃掉我可以拯救大家
那你就来吧
哦 不好了 蜥蜥 不要啊！

translation.en: Wanda said tardigrades are water animals,
translation.zh: 旺达说缓步动物是水生物种

translation.en: but you've been floating around for ages without any water.
translation.zh: 而你游荡了这么久却滴水不沾
你并不是在追捕我们
而是一直在找水

translation.en: The water reclamation pipes are behind the life-support systems.
translation.zh: 回收水管道就在生命维持系统的后面

translation.en: The water pouches... even the sweat on our faces.
translation.zh: 这些水泡 甚至是我们脸上的汗珠

translation.en: It was all irresistible to you, wasn't it, big guy?
translation.zh: 对你来说都极其诱人 是吧 大家伙？

translation.en: I'll take that as a yes.
translation.zh: 我就当你同意了
成功！打开了
我去
我来了 小拇指！
还有拉尔夫
还有拉尔夫

translation.en: You're making me all thirsty now.
translation.zh: 你把我也给弄口渴了

translation.en: A big guy like you needs more than this.
translation.zh: 像你这样的大家伙 这么点水可不够

translation.en: Good thing water just drifts in globules in micro-g.
translation.zh: 幸好水在微重力下会以水滴形态漂浮

translation.en: Let's shove some of these together and...
translation.zh: 我们把这些汇聚在一起 然后…

translation.en: You know, you're not as gross as I thought you were.
translation.zh: 其实 你没有我原本想的那么恶心
当我没说
你这是逗我玩儿的呢
等一下 那是便携缩小器吗？
那是便携缩小器吗？
你一定是把它吞下去了

translation.en: Why in the world did you swallow the Porta-Shrinker?
translation.zh: 你干吗要吞下便携缩小器呢？

translation.en: Yeccch! I don't have the handbook memorized,
translation.zh: 我没有背下手册的内容

translation.en: but I think this is well beyond normal Chief Maintenance Officer duties.
translation.zh: 不过这应该远远超过 首席维护官的一般职责范围了
维护官 不如说是铲屎官呢
好了 我们行动吧
按错按钮了
还是不对
好样的
搞定了
对了
那个也搞定了

translation.en: Now, should I tell everyone what just happened
translation.zh: 我现在是去跟大家汇报情况

translation.en: or clean up this mess first and then go tell them?
translation.zh: 还是先做完清理再去找他们呢？
还是先清理吧
你知道这意味着什么吧？

translation.en: We get to launch more laundry.
translation.zh: 我们可以射出更多的脏衣服
小拇指
拉尔夫
拉尔夫
小拇指？
哦 不好了
拉尔夫把小拇指给射出去了
我得去拯救他

translation.en: I'm coming for you, sweet Pinky!
translation.zh: 我来救你了 亲爱的小拇指

translation.en: Good thing tardigrades can survive in the vacuum of space.
translation.zh: 幸好缓步动物可以存活于太空真空
什么？是脏衣服
-可是…-旺达！ 你在干什么呢？

translation.en: You weren't cleared for a space walk. Get back here.
translation.zh: 你没有获准到舱外活动 快回来
我以为… 可是 小拇指呢？
我把他搞定了 不要啊！

translation.en: I mean I found the Porta-Shrinker. Pinky's small again.
translation.zh: 我是说我找到了便携缩小器 把他缩回了微型 相信我
把他缩回了微型 相信我

translation.en: Pinky's OK? Then I guess everything's tied up.
translation.zh: 小拇指没事吗？ 看来一切都没事了
除了我之外
救命啊！
各位 -拉尔夫-你没事吧？

translation.en: -You OK? -What's going on with the tardigrade?
translation.zh: -咋了？-缓步动物呢？

translation.en: No time to explain! Wanda's outside the station.
translation.zh: 没时间解释了 旺达出了空间站

translation.en: She's not tethered. She's floating away!
translation.zh: 她的系带脱落了 要飘走了！
这个绝对不安全

translation.en: If only we had something long enough to reach her.
translation.zh: 要是有足够长的东西够到她就好了
我们有啊

translation.en: The giant robotic arm attached to the outside of the station: Canadarm2.
translation.zh: 连接在空间站外部的巨型机械臂 加拿大臂2号

translation.en: Great thinking, Robotic Specialist. You're up.
translation.zh: 好极了 谢谢你 机械专家 该你上场了 把旺达带回来吧
该你上场了 把旺达带回来吧
旺达
坚持住

translation.en: OK. Remember your training. Remember your training...
translation.zh: 好 回忆一下训练内容
看起来不错 提姆
你能行的
我不行
提姆 你能行的

translation.en: I can do this. I can do this!
translation.zh: 我能行的
不要啊
我今天… 真倒霉
现在怎么办？ 我已经出动了

translation.en: I'm going to save Wanda, Chief Maintenance Officer style.
translation.zh: 我会用首席维护官的方式拯救旺达
我错过了什么？

translation.en: Let me guess: you thought the tardigrade wanted to eat you,
translation.zh: 我来猜猜看 你们以为缓步动物想吃你们

translation.en: but it was looking for water. It's a water animal, after all.
translation.zh: 结果它是在找水 毕竟它是水生动物

translation.en: Ralphie found the Porta-Shrinker when the tardigrade excreted it,
translation.zh: 拉尔夫在它排泄时找到了便携缩小器

translation.en: though I have no idea how it ended up swallowing it,
translation.zh: 虽然我很纳闷它怎么会把那个吞下去

translation.en: and Ralphie managed to shrink it back to its regular size.
translation.zh: 拉尔夫最终把它缩回了原来的大小

translation.en: Then he cleaned up the poo and ejected the laundry capsule with its dirty clothes
translation.zh: 然后他清理了大便 把脏衣服放进舱里射了出去

translation.en: but Wanda thought he'd ejected the tardigrade and went to save it,
translation.zh: 旺达以为他射出的是缓步动物 便去拯救它 结果没有系好系带

translation.en: neglecting to tether herself properly, so Tim used the Canadarm2 to catch her,
translation.zh: 便去拯救它 结果没有系好系带 提姆用加拿大臂2号成功钳住了她

translation.en: and he did, but Wanda's tether slipped and now she's too far away to grab.
translation.zh: 提姆用加拿大臂2号成功钳住了她 但旺达的系带滑掉了 现在飘得太远

translation.en: And that's why Ralphie is trying to save Wanda.
translation.zh: 所以拉尔夫去救旺达了

translation.en: Did I get it? Was I close?
translation.zh: 我说对了吗？有接近吗？
哦 没错

translation.en: And look at Ralphie go. Hello, Ralphie.
translation.zh: 快瞧瞧拉尔夫 你好 拉尔夫

translation.en: I see you've learned a thing or two about moving around in micro-g.
translation.zh: 看来你掌握了在微重力下移动的窍门
你好 福瑞斯老师

translation.en: Yeah, I know I can't move without pushing against something,
translation.zh: 对 我知道要推一个物体才能移动

translation.en: so I pushed off the station to head towards Wanda.
translation.zh: 所以我用空间站助推 向旺达进发了
超级拉尔夫前来拯救啦！
啊！
不要啊！
他… 他解开了自己的系带

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] Of course. It's the only way to reach Wanda.
translation.zh: 那当然了 他只有这样才够得到旺达

translation.en: Now to make this rescue smell lemon pine springtime mountain air fresh!
translation.zh: 现在我要让这场营救有柠檬松树春季山林般的清新气味
抓住你了
-太好了！-耶！
-好样的！-太棒了！
我以为…
我以为你把小拇指射出去了
我明白 对不起

translation.en: If I had just told everyone what I was doing first...
translation.zh: 要是我能在行动之前先跟大家说…
就像我说的嘛
我知道
沟通是关键
所以你有在听嘛

translation.en: I'll make it up to you as soon as we're back on the station.
translation.zh: 我们一回到空间站 我就补偿你
谢谢

translation.en: Just don't do it with Space Ice Cream, OK?
translation.zh: 但是太空冰淇淋就免了 好吧？
当然 反正也没剩的了

translation.en: -[Wanda] Uh-oh! -[Ralphie] Ah, well. No problem. I'll just...
translation.zh: 唉 算了 没事 我就…
无助地在太空中漂流
罐子空了
提姆 快做点什么啊！
你们坚持住啊

translation.en: [Tim] Oh no, they're too far out!
translation.zh: 糟了 他们飘太远了

translation.en: [Ralphie] And there's nothing left for us to push off of.
translation.zh: 我们没有可以助推的东西了

translation.en: For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction.
translation.zh: 每一个作用力 都有大小相等而方向相反的反作用力

translation.en: Ralphie, there is one thing left for us to push off of...
translation.zh: 拉尔夫 我们只剩一样东西可以助推了
那就是彼此
旺达 不要啊！
不要啊！

translation.en: I'm sorry, Ralphie, but there was no other way.
translation.zh: 对不起 拉尔夫 可是 我也只能这么做了
接住你了
可是… 旺达不在我身边！

translation.en: What do we do? We need a plan B!
translation.zh: 这下怎么办？ 我们需要备用方案
备用方案？
备用方案
迷你校车！
迷你校车前来拯救啦！
太好了
我们来啦！
-你做到了-好样的！
好极了！ 谢谢你们
好样的 同学们

translation.en: In a very short time, you've learned how to live and move in space.
translation.zh: 在很短的时间里 你们学会了如何在太空中移动和生活
现在是时候…

translation.en: [Ralphie] Repairing the damage to the Space Station.
translation.zh: 修复对空间站造成的损坏了

translation.en: We have some serious work to do.
translation.zh: 这下可够我们忙活了

translation.en: Well said, Chief Maintenance Officer Ralphie.
translation.zh: 说得好 首席维护官拉尔夫

translation.en: All of the life-support systems and their backups are online.
translation.zh: 所有的生命维持系统和备份都启动了
那我就放心了

translation.en: And I replenished some of our water supply.
translation.zh: 我还补足了我们的水源供应
不必客气
你别说 这还挺好喝的
洁净又爽口

translation.en: Here's a little for you too, big guy.
translation.zh: 我也给你备了一点 大家伙
哇 你们快看啊

translation.en: Another Soyuz spacecraft is here with our replacement crew.
translation.zh: 我们的替换人员乘着联盟号飞船来了
哈德菲尔德指挥官？

translation.en: Great to see you again, kids.
translation.zh: 很高兴再见到你们 孩子们
你好 拉尔夫
嗨

translation.en: So, how was your time on the ISS? Anything unusual happen?
translation.zh: 你们在国际空间站过得怎么样？ 有发生什么不寻常的事吗？
没什么太不寻常的事 对我们来说
好斗的甲虫吗？
比那个还要精彩
大家都到齐了吗？
-我们出发吧-准备好了！
等等迷你校车
那好
我们这就出发

translation.en: I can't say I'm sad to be going home.
translation.zh: 要回家了 我倒不觉得依依不舍

translation.en: I am. I was just getting good at moving around in micro-g.
translation.zh: 我觉得不舍 我才刚掌握怎么在微重力下移动

translation.en: I don't know about anyone else, but when I get back,
translation.zh: 我不知道你们怎么想 反正我回去后

translation.en: I'm going to sleep for 12 hours straight.
translation.zh: 我要连续睡12个小时
我同意
看来拉尔夫已经开始睡了

translation.en: [snorts] Of course you can... share my sandwich, Pinky.
translation.zh: 你当然可以吃我的三明治了 小拇指

translation.en: He got so good at communicating, he's even doing it in his sleep.
translation.zh: 他的沟通技能大增 连睡觉也不停歇呢
校车 施展你的魔法吧
找我的吗？

translation.en: Hello. Commander Hadfield here. How can I help?
translation.zh: 喂 我是哈德菲尔德指挥官 请问有什么事？
指挥官 你好

translation.en: When the kids arrived at the ISS,
translation.zh: 小朋友们去到国际空间站时

translation.en: they seemed pretty good at getting around in micro-gravity.
translation.zh: 他们看上去能在微重力下轻松移动
这真有那么简单吗？

translation.en: Well, many astronauts need a few days to get used to life in micro-g
translation.zh: 嗯 很多宇航员需要好几天 才能适应国际空间站上微重力的生活
才能适应国际空间站上微重力的生活

translation.en: Some even feel "space sick," which is a lot like feeling sea sick.
translation.zh: 有的人还会有太空晕动症 这和晕船的感觉很像
你还好吗 蜥蜥？

translation.en: It takes practice and some particular techniques.
translation.zh: 这得需要练习和一些特殊技巧

translation.en: The astronauts use hand holds to move ourselves around.
translation.zh: 宇航员会使用把手来进行移动

translation.en: And when astronauts need to stand still,
translation.zh: 当宇航员需要站着不动时

translation.en: they use foot straps to hold their feet in place.
translation.zh: 会用绑脚带把脚给固定住

translation.en: [kid] If things go wrong on the ISS, like electrical systems being destroyed
translation.zh: 如果国际空间站有故障 比如硕大的缓步动物破坏了电力系统

translation.en: by a humongous tardigrade, wouldn't NASA or someone notice?
translation.zh: 比如硕大的缓步动物破坏了电力系统 美国航天局什么的会发现吧？
当然 国际空间站

translation.en: The ISS is in constant contact with space agencies around the Earth.
translation.zh: 当然 国际空间站 随时与地球各地的航天局保持着联系

translation.en: Every little detail aboard the ISS,
translation.zh: 国际空间站上的任何一个小细节

translation.en: from the functioning of the life support systems
translation.zh: 不论是生命维持系统的运作

translation.en: to what the astronauts eat, is closely monitored.
translation.zh: 还是宇航员的饮食 都受到密切监控

translation.en: If you tried to sneak Space Ice Cream aboard...
translation.zh: 如果你偷偷带太空冰淇淋进来
他们会知道

translation.en: But even if the engineers on Earth know what's going on in the ISS,
translation.zh: 虽然地球上的工程师知道站内的情况

translation.en: it's still up to us to do repairs and maintenance
translation.zh: 但还是需要我们 负责维修 保持空间站的正常运作

translation.en: and keep the ISS in working order.
translation.zh: 负责维修 保持空间站的正常运作

translation.en: [kid] Ms. Frizzle was exercising to prevent muscle and bone density loss
translation.zh: 福瑞斯老师有在锻炼身体 以防在国际空间站流失肌肉和骨密度
以防在国际空间站流失肌肉和骨密度
为什么会这样呢？

translation.en: Without gravity pulling us downwards in space,
translation.zh: 由于太空中没有重力的下拉

translation.en: our bodies do a lot less work supporting themselves.
translation.zh: 我们身体要做的支撑工作少了许多

translation.en: And when you don't use your muscles, you lose them.
translation.zh: 而肌肉不用的话 就会流失掉

translation.en: So, astronauts need to stay on top of their workout regimens,
translation.zh: 所以宇航员需要坚持健身
在特别改装的器械上锻炼

translation.en: to keep their muscles and their bones in their pre-flight condition.
translation.zh: 让肌肉和骨骼维持在飞行前状态

translation.en: I'd better start training if I'm going to be an astronaut one day.
translation.zh: 要想当宇航员的话 我得开始锻炼了
谢谢哈德菲尔德指挥官 再见
再见
蜥蜥？
晚安啦
大家把安全带系好！

translation.en: [Arnold] Please let this be a normal field trip!
translation.zh: 希望这是一场普通的野外实习
-跟福瑞斯一起？-不可能

translation.en: ♪ Oh, cruising on down Main Street ♪
translation.zh: 在大路上巡游
会让你感到放松

translation.en: ♪ Next thing that you know ♪ -♪ You're seeing... ♪ -[Ms. Frizzle] Whoo-hooo!
translation.zh: 不久后你将会看到…
章鱼就在你身旁！
在声波上冲浪
穿越繁星点点

translation.en: ♪ Take a left at your intestine ♪
translation.zh: 转进你的肠道

translation.en: ♪ Take your second right past Mars ♪
translation.zh: 第二个路口右转 路过火星
神奇校车上
在鼻孔中航行

translation.en: ♪ Climb on the Magic School Bus ♪
translation.zh: 搭乘神奇校车

translation.en: -♪ Spank a plankton, too ♪ -[Wanda] Take that!
translation.zh: -拍打浮游生物-接招吧！
我们的神奇校车
漂流在熔岩河上
在神奇校车上

translation.en: ♪ Such a fine thing to do ♪
translation.zh: 实在太有趣

translation.en: ♪ So strap your bones right to the seat ♪
translation.zh: 快赶紧绑好安全带

translation.en: ♪ Come on in and don't be shy ♪
translation.zh: 加入我们不要怕

translation.en: ♪ Just to make your day complete ♪
translation.zh: 让你过个快乐天

translation.en: ♪ You might get baked into a pie ♪
translation.zh: 也许你会做成派
在神奇校车上

translation.en: ♪ Step in, step in, step inside ♪
translation.zh: 上车 快上车

translation.en: ♪ It's a wilder ride, come on! ♪
translation.zh: 狂野之旅在等你 快来！

translation.en: ♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus! ♪
translation.zh: 快来搭神奇校车！
